title: Topic 001 Question 027
body: Your company has decided to build a backup replica of their on-premises user authentication PostgreSQL database on Google Cloud Platform. The database is 4
TB, and large updates are frequent. Replication requires private address space communication.
Which networking approach should you use?
options: Google Cloud VPN connected to the data center network
A NAT and TLS translation gateway installed on-premises
A Google Compute Engine instance with a VPN server installed connected to the data center network
